meanings.definition: To put a new label on something.
meanings.sent1: She is relabelling the jars with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The company is relabelling the products for the upcoming sale.
meanings.sent3: John kept relabelling the boxes with funny names just to confuse his sister.
meanings.sent4: The artist was relabelling reality with his unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed the students how relabelling can make things look brand new.

meanings.definition: The act of putting a new label on something.
meanings.sent1: The relabelling of the products was done to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: We had to do a relabelling of all the files in the office.
meanings.sent3: The relabelling of the books made the library look more organized.
meanings.sent4: The relabelling of history with new names sparked a debate among historians.
meanings.sent5: The relabelling of the boxes helped in identifying the contents easily.
